attributes.action: box the ears of baby boxers - legislate to regulate the age of those partaking in violent sports as a child protection issue
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Like many viewers, I was horrified to see parents encouraging their youngsters fighting - quite apart from the poor parenting, what about the harm that could be inflicted a) to themselves b) to opponents (both underage) in the boxing ring. In light of this documentary, please review guidelines on age and supervision of defence sports, (some of which are basically assaults) enabling police, social services and health visitors to intervene - some people just shouldn't be given children !

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
